name: Kaytee B.
text: So I ordered a pizza and a pasta bowl. The order said it the guy left the store at 815. By the time I got it, it was 850. We only live 12 minutes away. On the GPS tracker, first the driver ent into the wrong driveway. Sat there for about a …More

name: Muhammad Shahjehan
text: Nice and clean dominos location. I got a pizza with garlic sauce as base instead of tomato sauce but when I got it the pizza wasn't made correct. They person behind counter made another pizza right away and even walked it to my car outside. …More

name: Shaliza Alli
text: A bright and energetic atmosphere. Smells like pizza heaven upon opening the door. It was fun to watch the pizza makers making the pizza right in front of us. It is mostly take out but it does have some seats on the side if you want to dine …More

name: William Grieshober
text: Great store.  Always fresh and hot.

name: Jimmy Walczak
text: Really disappointed in the service of this place. Placed an order for delivery around 11:45....it’s no 1:10 and still no food. The gentleman on the phone Johnathan was unapologetic, complained that he’s under staffed. Said he would re make …More

name: ImmI Khan
text: Always on time, easy going, willing to do anything to make your experience perfect. Love these guys.

name: Craig Connock
text: Great quick and accurate service.

name: Arnav Sawant
text: Order was not placed successfully got an error but the credit card was charged. The only number provided by Dominos was the store number.  When contacted the store, Specifically one young staff was very very rude as if I was trying to get …More

name: A BANSAL
text: One of the best Dominos franchise locations in the Amherst area. We have ordered from them frequently. Always excellent quality. Only once, the crust was not the one we had ordered. Although we did not ask for a credit but they gave it …More

name: Lizzy K
text: So, they were a bit behind and it was a little disappointing for Dominos. Usually our food is ready and I'm still driving to get there. Staff was Professional and tried their best to hurry and get orders done and right. Hope it takes less …More

name: Mary Krause
text: My grandma ordered pizza as a treat and some chicken and barbecue with bacon, the pizza was burnt on the crust. The barbecue chicken with bacon was formed together and burnt. We tried to get another pizza around 5 minutes after the pizza …More

name: Jason Hurley
text: Pizza was fine, but the wings were terrible. Was hoping to find a low cost alternative to all the local pizza places around Buffalo, but it's worth spending twice as much, I guess.

name: Bryan Breedlove
text: Probably the best Domino's I've been too.

name: DeannaDLH
text: Order is always accurate, the store is always spotless, and everyone who works there is so welcoming. best dominos!

name: tahmid usa
text: Excellent customer service. great food. I made a time order for 12pm. As soon as I walked in the order was ready to pic up. No waste of time. Thanks for the great service.

name: John Adams
text:
The new address is 6031 Transit Rd.

This is a bright, brand new, super clean location with a very friendly staff! …More

text: Bad experiences for me at this location,   employee have 0 experiences to dale with customers with bad attitude, this was first time for me at this location,  other domain's locations like cheektowaga, amherst and downtown they are excellent.

name: William Pates
text: The wait time was atrocious.  In my opinion the one perk to ordering from a Domino's is the quick turnaround and if they can't handle that there really is no reason to give them our businesses.  My wife waited 45 minutes and ended up having …More

text:
STAY AWAY!!!!!!
Pizza was burnt and cold. When i contacted the store staff did not care and did not offer a refund.

text: It is good. The place is clean. The staff is wonderful. The pizza was dripping oil but delicious..

name: Grant Keene
text: Since they change the recipe the best pizza around give it a try

name: Quinn Kids
text: First off let me just say I love their pizza it is always consistently a good option for pizza if you want it quick.  Ordered 2 pizzas delivery was very fast and  always well worth it.

name: Karen Mauger
text: Price is right, very fast. Don't know how to get the rewards if you order in the restaurant. Guess it all has to be done on the phone.

text: One stop destination for BEST pizza!!!!

text: Great pizza. Fast delivery. Good prices.

name: Dana Keblawi
text:
Great Pizza, very easy to navigate website...prompt delivery!
Highly recommend!

name: Robert Cronyn
text: Great pizza and fast delivery. Live on the outer edge of their delivery area, and it’s typically 27 min from placing the online order until it’s at our door. Typically order a couple normal pizzas and some weird ones, and these guys always nail it.

name: G haddad777
text: Good food for a good price

text: Have been frequent visitor and generally take their large 3 topping pizza deal

name: Jaws Small
text: Very good quality pizza

name: MrVander3
text: I literally just had a pizza delivered at 1:10am to my office after touching buttons on my phone, so yeah it was awesome. Also, the pizza was still so hot i had to let it cool and I have to say it really was good.

name: xVacunaVenomx
text: Ordered online and came to pick it up. Service was fast and the food was good! This was my first time at Domino's since I was a child. Will absolutely be back.

name: ed ordian
text: It took literally 5 minutes and 2 employees to process my credit card payment along with my food being cold and the wings with little sauce. Wasn't enjoying the loud Arab music playing inside either.

name: D Feng
text: I usually order online and pick up in store. The online ordering process is very smooth. If you don't know, there's a food tracker online that can track your order. I had to wait for an hour for my food. When I finally arrived at the …More

text: Best Domino’s in WNY; driver and employees are very nice and provide great service. Thanks!

text: Excellent Website, easy order process, fast delivery, and delicious pizza!

name: Alica Best
text: This store delivers such quality service all the time. I can’t say enough about how good and timely all their accommodations are. Favorite Domino’s location.

name: Madison Amey
text: Nathan's a great assistant manager. The whole staff is always friendly.

name: Juliana King
text: This Dominos team never disappoints! By far the best Dominos store I've ever ordered food from!

name: Harral Swag
text: Their service is so poor it is very abusive people, they do not know how to order or they do not know how to talk.

name: Mr Bryon Wilson
text: Foods good when u finally get it!! Staff is very fresh (new) and manager is kinda rude.

name: karin snyder
text: The chicken wings are tiny and tasted like quail. Very greasy and had dark meat. The wings are the size  of my pinky finger. I'm from Buffalo, and I know chicken wings! That was not a chicken wing. I do not know what they are passing of to the public as wings, but bewear.

name: Nina Berezowska
text: The pizza is good, there is better in the area, but Domino's delivers late at night which is a plus. The wings are really bad, especially for Buffalo. The desserts are yummy and delivery's quick.

name: Deron Mann
text: Domino's rocks!!! I was in and out. Fast service, friendly staff, good food. 10/10

name: husky M
text:
Lady who cashed me out tryed charging me $14 for a large pizza that they sell for 7.99
And said if you don't ask you pay double....
You wonder why little Cesar is growing out of control wow

name: Cindy Youngers
text: Super fast service Love The Cheezy Bread

name: Michael Parker
text: The pizza was very good. Concerns about the menu no prices on any of the items you don't know if you are over  paying until you get the bill.

name: Applemartinez **
text: As always great service!!!!

name: Nick Toons
text: Fast and reliable service, polite drivers, expedient delivery, decent pizza (you get what you pay for). Really all you can ask for in a pizza shop selling $7 pies.

name: Shail Dekhtawala
text: Amazing food and superb quality.

name: Gary Schlottman
text: Perfect everytime I get one.  Enough sauce and cheese.  Just wish when you order double mushrooms you get double.

text: Decent pizza at a nice price. They deliver quickly.

name: Natalie M
text: Quickly done for pick up or delivered at good time. Food is great! Thanks!!

name: Kevin Xiang
text: The large carry out deals.... SOOO GOOOODDD. If you're broke or don't want a $5 express mart pizza, then this place is the place to go. This pizza is the pizza for you and me homie. Like, cheap good azz pizza what else do you want. AHHHHHH

text: Great pan pizza! Wings could be better...online ordering and delivery were excellent!!!

text: I am extremely disappointed with the customer service at this particular dominos restaurant. The manager in charge was very rude and hung up on me.
